page.title: 31Games we play at Banchory Primary School
page.content:
French Skipping-a circle of elastic that you jump in,out and on.The order you jump is:

in,out,in,on,in then put your legs over each side,in,out and finally in.When you are doing this two peoples legs are in it.

Tag-It is a game for two or more players ( best to have more then two.) One person is it and they have to run after everyone who is playing and when they touch someone and say tag and that person is it.There is also a dell which is bars or a wall and when someone is touching it nobody can tag them.
Amy,Georgene and Patrycja
